feed.title: DocuSeal Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.5.5
entry.content: 🆕 Add field settings dropdown to the field area title 🛠 Use PDF/A for audit log PDF 🐞 Fix BMP images upload

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.5.6
entry.content: 🆕 Add number format 🆕 Add template webhook events 🛠 Allow to use signing certs with legacy algorithms

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.5.7
entry.content: 🆕 Add submission created webhook event 🆕 Make documents copy email configurable per template 🛠 Apply digital signature after signed by all parties by default 🐞 Fix missing form field values in document previews

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.5.8
entry.content: 🆕 Add download combined PDF button 🐞 Fix missing field values in signed PDFs

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.5.9
entry.content: 🆕 Allow to draw signature on mobile with QR scan 🆕 Allow to add default initials in user profile 🐞 Fix recipient name autocomplete
